title: Contemporary Paris Stay Steps Away from CDG Airport Terminals
description: Stroll off a long-haul flight and straight into a cloud-soft bed at Holiday Inn Express Paris - CDG Airport, an IHG Hotel. Just steps away from the Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport international terminals, this hotel is perfectly placed for a layover or longer adventure in Paris, with city-bound trains and shuttles closeby. Wake up to a delicious breakfast at the Market Corner before you head out for a day exploring the best Paris has to offer.
